Engineer.title: Software Engineer
Engineer.description: Develops and maintains software applications and systems
responsibilities: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
Collaborate with team members on feature development
Follow development best practices and coding standards

Senior.title: Senior Engineer
Senior.description: Experienced engineer providing technical leadership and mentorship
responsibilities: Lead technical design and architecture decisions
Drive technical innovation and best practices

Manager.title: Engineering Manager
Manager.description: Leads engineering teams and manages technical projects

Principal.title: Principal Engineer
Principal.description: Senior technical expert providing architectural leadership
responsibilities: Mentor senior engineers and technical leads
Influence technical decisions across multiple teams
